title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.103 - Extraordinary depreciation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.103 - Extraordinary depreciation

State Regulations

Depreciation caused by unusual wear and tear, unexpected
disintegration, obsolescence or inadequacy beyond that attributable ordinary
loss of physical or service life. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
451.103

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
